Uses of Class
com.forgerock.opendj.cli.CommandBuilder

  • Packages that use CommandBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.forgerock.opendj.cli
    Classes implementing the OpenDJ CLI shared APIs.
    org.forgerock.opendj.config.dsconfig
    This package contains the DS config.
    org.opends.server.tools.tasks
    This package contains classes that support client tool interaction with the tasks backend.
    org.opends.server.util.cli
    Provides a high-level framework for implementing command-line tools.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CommandBuilder.append(CommandBuilder builder)
      Appends the arguments of another command builder to this command builder.

    • Uses of CommandBuilder in org.forgerock.opendj.config.dsconfig

      Methods in org.forgerock.opendj.config.dsconfig that return CommandBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandBuilder LDAPManagementContextFactory.getContextCommandBuilder()
      Returns the command builder that provides the equivalent arguments in interactive mode to get the management context.

    • Uses of CommandBuilder in org.opends.server.tools.tasks

      Methods in org.opends.server.tools.tasks with parameters of type CommandBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void TaskScheduleUserData.updateCommandBuilderWithTaskSchedule(CommandBuilder commandBuilder, TaskScheduleUserData taskSchedule)
      An static utility method that can be used to update the object used to display the equivalent command-line with the contents of a given task schedule object.

    • Uses of CommandBuilder in org.opends.server.util.cli
